committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Assistance and Unemployment Compensation

official_title: A bill to amend titles II and XVI of the Social Security Act to provide that an individual receiving child's insurance benefits on the basis of blindness or other disability shall not lose his or her entitlement to such benefits by reason of marriage, if such marriage is to a recipient of supplemental security income benefits.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old-Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) (OASDI) and title XVI (Supplemental Security Income) (SSI) of the Social Security Act to provide that neither entitlement to child's insurance benefits under OASDI nor SSI eligibility shall be affected by the marriage to each other of individuals receiving such benefits.

titles.title: A bill to amend titles II and XVI of the Social Security Act to provide that an individual receiving child's insurance benefits on the basis of blindness or other disability shall not lose his or her entitlement to such benefits by reason of marriage, if such marriage is to a recipient of supplemental security income benefits.
